review: Not as good as I thought it would be so I have gone back to my chromecast it gives me more of what I was looking for..
author: Ray Regan

review: Love my fire stick. Works great.
author: joy

review: Best thing smoking in the streaming world
author: Michael Winters

review: Previously used a Roku box for my streaming video including Netflix. He seemed a lot easier to navigate and to add channels. I suppose I will eventually get used to it. I should have realized that they want you to subscribe to Amazon Prime as well as associated channels.
author: Karen white

review: I am very pleased with the fire stick.  I needed to call technical support because I was using the remote control from the cable company instead of the T.V. remote.  The directions could have been clearer but the technical support was very helpful.  It is very easy to use and my grandchildren love it.
author: Kathleen Elsesser

review: I love Amazon Fire TV.  I have the box and two sticks.  The only difference I've really noticed is the stick doesn't have voice search.  This isn't really that important to me, so I am completely satisfied with the stick.
author: Jackson Tan
